translation.note: droplist choice - Even parity
translation.variant: Par

translation.note: droplist choice - Odd parity
translation.variant: Impar

translation.note: droplist choice - No parity
translation.variant: Ninguno

section.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a reference name was automatically changed during a copy/paste.
translation.variant: Otro nodo ya está utilizando el nombre de referencia del nodo importado. Se ha creado automáticamente un nombre de referencia exclusivo para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a site number was automatically changed during a copy/paste.
translation.variant: Otro sitio ya está utilizando el número del sitio importado. Se ha creado automáticamente un número de sitio exclusivo para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a network number was automatically changed during a copy/paste.
translation.variant: Otra red ya está utilizando el número de la red importada. Se ha creado automáticamente un número de red exclusivo para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a device id was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: Otro controlador ya está utilizando el identificador de controlador del dispositivo importado. Se ha creado automáticamente un identificador de dispositivo exclusivo para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a machine address was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: Ya hay otra controlador usando la dirección IP pública del controlador importado. Se ha creado automáticamente una dirección exclusiva para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that a machine address was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: Otro controlador ya está utilizando la dirección del controlador importado. Se ha creado automáticamente una dirección exclusiva para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates that an equipment instance number was automatically changed during an import.
translation.variant: Otro programa de control ya está utilizando el número de instancia del programa de control importado. Se ha creado automáticamente un número de instancia exclusivo para usted.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates a mismatch between a device and a piece of equipment during an import.
translation.variant: El controlador importado ha intentado asignarse a un programa de control que ya se encuentra asignado a otro controlador. El programa de control no esta asignado.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indication of an attempt to assign a non-existent equipment to a device.
translation.variant: El controlador importado ha intentado asignarse un programa de control que no existe. Puede asignar este programa de control exportándolo (desde la misma base de datos que este controlador) y luego importárlo en esta base de datos.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an attempt to assign an equipment to a non-existent device.
translation.variant: El programa de control importado ha intentado asignarse a un controlador que no existe. Puede asignar este programa de control exportando el controlador (desde la misma base de datos que este programa de control) y luego importándolo en esta base de datos.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - error trying to set an equipment parameter
translation.variant: No se pudo establecer un parámetro de programa de control. Esto se debe normalmente a que el programa de control no ha vuelto a cargarse (durante la importación o antes de la exportación).

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error with a report parameter due to a problem with a control program during a database import or export.
translation.variant: No se pudo establecer un parámetro de informe. Esto se debe normalmente a que el programa de control no ha vuelto a cargarse (durante la importación o antes de la exportación).

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indication of an error trying to assign a schedule group
translation.variant: No asignó este nodo a un grupo de horarios debido a que el grupo no existe. Debe configurar manualmente todos los grupos de horarios, tanto en la base de datos importada como en la exportada.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a reporting action
translation.variant: No asignó a una acción de elaboración de informes debido a que la acción no existe. Debe configurar manualmente todas las acciones de elaboración de informes, tanto en la base de datos importada como en la exportada.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to set up source nodes due to a non-existent source tree
translation.variant: No se pudieron importar los nodos de la fuente. No se encontró el árbol de la fuente. Debe agregar manualmente los árboles de la fuente y configurar las normas tanto para la base de datos importada como para la exportada.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a source parent location problem.
translation.variant: No puede determinar el sitio para el programa de control debido a que no está asignado a un controlador. El programa de control se ha asignado a la raíz del árbol de la fuente.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a source parent node. Parent node was not found.
translation.variant: No se pudo asignar el nodo de origen de la fuente. No se encontró la fuente en la base de datos importada.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign a source rule.
translation.variant: Error de norma de la fuente. Debe agregar manualmente los árboles de la fuente y configurar las normas tanto para la base de datos importada como para la exportada.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indication of an error with an operator or group due to a problem encountered during a database import.
translation.variant: No se encontró un operador o grupo de operadores a donde se le se remitió. Para corregir, agregue el operador o grupo que falta y vuelva a importar.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indication of an error with a missing role encountered during a database import.
translation.variant: No se pudo encontrar un rol. Para corregir, agregue el rol que falta y vuelva a importar.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with a privilege being invalid for this database version.
translation.variant: No se pudo retener un privilegio debido a que no aplica para esta versión. Esto no debe causar ningún problema.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with a user preference being invalid for this database version.
translation.variant: No se pudo retener una preferencia de usuario debido a que no aplica para esta versión. Esto no debe causar ningún problema.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with a missing category during a database import
translation.variant: Agregó una categoría de visores que falta. Esto sucede cuando un visor en la base de datos importada posee una categoría que no está en la base de datos existente. Vaya a la página de categorías de gráficas o propiedades, en el árbol de configuración.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error with adding a category that was previously missing.
translation.variant: No se pudo agregar una categoría de visor que falta, por lo que no se agregarán los visores para esta ubicación.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error attaching a view to a node during a database import
translation.variant: No se pudo adjuntar el visor. Esto sucede cuando no existe el archivo visor utilizado por la base de datos importada. Sustituya el archivo de vistas que falta y vuelva a adjuntarlo al nodo.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error when adding a default view due to a non-existent child node.
translation.variant: No se pudieron agregar las vistas predeterminadas para un secundario de un programa de control debido a que no se encontró el secundario.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
Label - indicates an error trying to assign an equipment. The equipment is not allowed to be assigned to that particular device.
translation.variant: El programa de control importado no se puede asignar a un controlador debido a que no es válido para dicho controlador.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates an error assigning the group-cache to a device because it doesn't exist.
translation.variant: Uno de los controladores de caché de grupo especificados no era válido. Se ha modificado el sitio para que no utilice caché de grupos. Debe solucionar este problema cuando finalice la importación.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where an imported site or router has been configured for NAT, but the system does not have NAT enabled.
translation.variant: NAT no está habilitado para el sistema, pero un sitio o enrutador importado dispone de información de configuración de NAT. Debe habilitar NAT después de que concluya la importación.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where an imported router has been configured for NAT, but it's site does not have NAT for devices enabled.
translation.variant: El enrutador importado posee una dirección NAT, pero el sitio no indica que sus controladores están detrás de un NAT. Debe habilitar NAT para controladores cuando finalice la importación.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where hierarchical servers is not enabled for this system, but the clipping contains hierarchical server data.
translation.variant: Los servidores jerárquicos no están habilitados. No se ha importado el vínculo del servidor.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where the clipping contains a server link, but the system is a child hierarchical server and therefore does not allow server links.
translation.variant: Los vínculos de servidores no son compatibles con los servidores jerárquicos secundarios.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where the clipping contains a navigation link, but the system is a parent hierarchical server and therefore does not allow navigation links.
translation.variant: Los vínculos de navegación no son compatibles con los servidores jerárquicos principales.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where a file is missing that might be needed to correctly paste the system fragment at a later time.
translation.variant: Falta un archivo necesario. Esto puede generar un error en la importación.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem where the device in the clipping could not be imported as it was into the target database. The device type was changed before being imported.
translation.variant: El nombre del dispositivo cambió durante la importación. Se precisa descarga.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a conflict was resolved by updating the CCN/IP connection CCN gateway address to the address of the gateway being imported.
translation.variant: La dirección de puerta de enlace CCN de conexión CCN/IP ha cambiado.

translation.note: These keys are used in the SiteBuilder application. They are information/error messages resulting from the creation of the HVAC network (sites/areas/devices/equipment). This text results from the copy and paste of items, import/export of items, and assignment of 1 item to another.
label - indicates a problem that the import process could not update the CCN/IP Connection's CCN Gateway address to match the imported gateway. Further action is required by the user.
translation.variant: Se ha importado la puerta de enlace CCN, pero no ha podido actualizarse la dirección de puerta de enlace CCN de conexión CCN/IP. Actualícela manualmente.

section.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)

As in first week of the month

As in fifth week of the month

Used with keys above to form phrase like: Every 2nd Tuesday
translation.variant: Cada

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Monday
translation.variant: Lun

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Tuesday
translation.variant: Mar

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Wednesday
translation.variant: Mié

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Thursday
translation.variant: Jue

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Friday
translation.variant: Vie

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Saturday
translation.variant: Sáb

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
short day name for Sunday
translation.variant: Dom

translation.note: Used in formatting dates of schedules by CoreSchedule*Node.java. (See schedule report.)
For any day of the week
translation.variant: Cualquier
